attributes.action: Public Health Issue Petition: to reduce gun & knife crime in London
attributes.additional_details:
We need to have this issue addressed immediately in seeking to reduce violent crime significantly in the Capital.

We request that the Government urgently consider 

- Increasing police presence on our streets
- Introducing counsellors into the education system to support students
- Providing more opportunities for young people 

Government agencies need to work with young people to hear their experiences and learn what systems are needed to reduce the violence on our streets.
attributes.background:
Since January 2018, there has been 48 deaths from gun or knife crime. A majority of lives lost are teenagers or young adults.

We urge the Government to recognise this as a Public Health issue; to manage the cause and effect of this epidemic impacting those living and working in London.
